recommendations: Madhuleena Medhi “Rohit is a career consultant in its true sense. He really goes that deep/extra mile to understand both sides and his comprehensive knowledge can help you ensure you are taking the right decision. It was great working with him and would definitely love to work with him again. I would highly recommend to connect with him if you are looking for a career change. His work reflects his dedication, knowledge, and hard work. He is meticulous in his approach and a very reliable professional. His clarity of thought and communication is impeccable. He is a true asset to any organisation he's at.”

I rose from being a general body member in session 2011-12 to the Joint…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Rotaract Club Chandigarh Himalayan is the youth wing of the Rotary Club of Himalayan Ranges, Mansa Devi, affiliated to the prestigious Rotary International. It comes under the district 3080. The club’s stated purpose is to bring together business and professional leaders in order to provide humanitarian services, encourage high ethical standards in all vocations, and help build goodwill and peace in the world. I rose from being a general body member in session 2011-12 to the Joint Director of Public Relations in 2012-13 and Joint Director of External Affairs in 2013-14.During this period I have organized various activities belonging to the five avenues of service in Rotaract - Club, Vocational, Community, International, and Youth. Took charge of the Marketing, Hospitality and Publicity committees in multiple events, major being:Salsa Slam, a fundraiser – 2012, 2013, 2014. Kidolympics, a sports fest for the underprivileged – 2012, 2013, 2014 Taare Zameen Par, an art competition for the underprivileged - 2012, 2013, 2014.Recruitment Drive for the club - 2012, 2013, 2014, Human Chain: Blood Donation Awareness Campaign - 2012, 2013.I also organized a few events such as:Anti-Drug Campaign, an attempt to create awareness about drug abuse - 2013Rotaract ki Gandhigiri, an event for the underprivileged to celebrate life on the special day of Gandhi Jayanti - 2013As a member of the club, my duties were to understand the objectives of the club, to collaborate with the other members for successful completion of our projects and activities which I fulfilled. Working with Rotaract was one of the best experiences I have ever had.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

organizations.title: Rotaract Club Chandigarh Himalayan
organizations.membership_type: Joint Director-External Affairs, Joint Director-Public Relations
organizations.description: “To the pinnacle and nothing else” This is the tagline of the Rotaract Club Chandigarh Himalayan and I have inculcated the same in myself in the three years I served with this club.I worked with the Rotaract Club for three years during which I worked as a general body member, joint director public relations and joint director external affairs for each year respectively. I also organized a few events during that period such as “ANTI DRUG CAMPAIGN” and “ROTARACT KI GANDHIGIRI”. Organizing these events and being an active participant of the rest provided me with priceless exposure and experience of marketing management at a basic level. Working with my team, I publicized our events to encompass as much crowd as I could for our events. I handled the distribution of brochures, pamphlets, posters etc. at various places such as markets, parks, malls, clubs, restaurants, hangout spots, colleges etc. The major segment included colleges where I interacted with their administration regarding permission to operate in their campuses as well as the students to make them aware of our events, communicate the value which those events will offer to them and convince them to be a part of it. I handled the selling of passes through which I gained experience of sales and persuasion.
